tokenReference.$comment: Some of the other types can reference another token or property of another token (depending on the context).

valueEscapedString.$comment: For values that can be a token reference or a string, the string may need to be escaped to disambiguate it from a token reference. If the string value begins with an '@' character, then it must be escaped using a backslash ('\@'). Other '@' characters in the string do not need to be escaped in this way.

valueReferenceOrString.$comment: Token reference or an escaped string

descriptionProperty.description: A description of this design token, token set or token array.

defaultTypeProperty.description: The default type of any nested design tokens.

commonProperties.$comment: Properties shared by design tokens, token sets and token arrays.

name.description: The name of this design token, token set or token array.

commonSetAndArrayProperties.$comment: Additional properties shared token sets and token arrays.

commonTokenProperties.$comment: Additional properties shared by all design tokens.

id.description: A unique identifier for this design token.

jsonToken.title: A JSON design token
jsonToken.description: A design token that can have arbitrary JSON data as its value. Useful for arbitrary, platform-agnostic data. Can also be used as a means of prototyping new types of design tokens for inclusion in future UDT spec versions

oneOf.$comment: Intentionally omitting string from this list, as it's covered by valueReferenceOrString below.

colorHexValue.title: A hex color value
colorHexValue.description: A 24bit RGB color value expressed as a hexadecimal triplet, just like in CSS. Note, future versions of UDT may extend this value type to also allow for other color representations.

colorToken.title: A color design token
colorToken.description: A named color with an optional description text.

tokenArrayObject.description: An object containing an array of design tokens.

tokenSet.description: An unordered set of design tokens.

title: UDT file
description: A file containing one or more universal design tokens.

$schema.description: The specific UDT JSON schema version used by this file.
